gMaps for Windows Phone got 100k reviews!

22 Feb 2016

Monitoring app reviews with Reviews Reader app @winreviews, I finally noticed gMaps got 100k of reviews!

Thank you, users! We are reading all of them, believe it or not!

If you have any ideas how to make the app better, or any other feedback, feel free to contact us using gmaps feedback email address or gMaps uservoice.

If you liked this post, you can share it with your followers or follow me on Twitter!
